channel.title: Understanding Generative AI on The Shubham Co
channel.description: Recent content in Understanding Generative AI on The Shubham Co

item.title: What Is Generative AI?
item.description:
1. Introduction

Over the last few years, terms like ChatGPT, AI writing code, and AI creating images have gone from being research experiments to everyday tools.

At the centre of this shift is Generative AI.

But what exactly does Generative AI mean?
And why does it feel so different from the AI systems we’ve had for years?

This article answers those questions using plain language and real-world examples, so you build intuition before diving into theory.
